metadata.title: CVE-2020-29074 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
scan.c in x11vnc 0.9.16 uses IPC_CREAT|0777 in shmget calls, which allows access by actors other than the current user.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-29074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

x11vnc - 0.9.16-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: x11vnc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.16-5').
